title: Worst skin imaginable game.
body:
Simply put, Answer the above posters champion name by replying with the worst possible skin you can think of for them. I mean so terrifyingly terrible that it will hurt to see it in game. Then after that, post your own champion name it the cycle continues.

Example
> Person 1: Urgot
> Person 2: Prom Queen Urgot

I'll start with Darius.

replies.body:
"Medicated Jinx".  Dresses normally, acts calm and subdued, speaks in a soft, monotone voice and generally behaves like someone who's taken a lot of Ritalin.  

{{champion:412}}

Fruit seller soraka. :P

Draaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaven!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!{{champion:119}}

Philosopher draven: Draaaaaaaaaaaven????
{{champion:24}}

Prom Queen Gragas

{{champion:101}}

Waitress lux. Her ult is noodles.

{{champion:81}}

Ez with a taric costume.

Vi

Ballerina Azir. minions (and ult guys) are also ballerinas....
{{champion:99}} (not including her already bad skins)

Poodle Warwick

{{champion:9}}

You make this difficult because the bad ones are also hilarious which makes them less bad unless you are a super srs grimdark fanboy.

That said, Unicode Darius, where his entire model and animations are just like one or two Unicode symbols with no sound effects or voice over.

Teemo.

Angelic Teemo

{{champion:83}}

Choir singer Sona: If you don't get this read sonas lore
